txt.en: You have taken too long to vanquish Nengon and his brethren
You have taken too long to vanquish Nengon and his brethren

Nengon is a foul and ancient darkwater ruling over Glinghant, the ancient gardens of Ann√∫minas.\n\nNengon and his darkwater brethren must all be defeated in rapid succession, lest they are allowed a chance to recover and reform. From the time the first falls, there is a small window of time in which all must fall as well.
Nengon resides at the far end of the gardens.
Nengon and his darkwater brethren must all be defeated in rapid succession, lest they are allowed a chance to recover and reform.
Nengon and his darkwater brethren must all be defeated in rapid succession, lest they are allowed a chance to recover and reform.
Destroy the darkwater in rapid succession
